FAQs    Contact         News & Events           Calendar of Events    Annual Events    Past Events         Resources & Services           Pop-Up Pantry    Individual Consultations    Homeless Assistance    Wellness Supplies    Stress Relief Place    Sexual Health/ Healthy Relationships    Literature Library & Videos    Alcohol & e-CHUG    Studying    Conflict Management    Sleep         Workshops           Workshops Offered    Request a Workshop         Policies           Alcohol and Other Drug    Smoke Free Campus Policy and Fine Payment    Student Disciplinary Policy    Cannabis Policy          Eyebrow menu    UIC Connection    Student Affairs    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                     FLAMES @ THE READY:A Self-Defense Seminar for UIC  Students    Posted on April 21, 2020                     FLAMES  @ THE READY  A Self-Defense Seminar for UIC  Students    JOIN US FOR A VIRTUAL SELF-DEFENSE SEMINAR!  Thursday, April 30, 2020  2:00 p.m.    TOPICS INCLUDE:  De-escalation Techniques  El-Train and Public Transit Scenarios Attacker Mentality  Situational Awareness   Learn and practice a new safety skill. Join us for a self-defense seminar lead by Wing Tsun Illinois. Skilled instructors will guide attendees through common self-defense scenarios. Learn basic skills and put them to practice.    SPOTS ARE LIMITED.  RSVP is required at: go.uic.edu/FlamesSelfDefense    Sponsored by:  Commuter and Off-Campus Life, Undergraduate Student Government, Center for Student Involvement, Fraternity and Sorority Life, UIC Alumni Association, Residential Housing Association, Wellness Center      Modified on April 21, 2020
